      • getChannel

        public Schema.ChannelMeta getChannel​(Point point,
                                     java.sql.Connection con)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the Channel for the given Point. Adds it if it was not existing before.
        Parameters:
        point - the Point
        con - a database Connection, in case the entry needs to be added
        Returns:
        the Schema.ChannelMeta; or null if not in Cache and type cannot be detected
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - on error while adding

        Parameters:
        edgeId - the Edge-ID
        componentId - the Component-ID
        channelId - the Channel-ID
        Returns:
        the database ID for table 'channel', null if there is no entry yet
